verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G3004%G2532>spake<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> unto <S%G846%G4314>them<s%> to this end, that men <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G1573>faint<s%>;

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, There was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> , which feared <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> , neither <S%G2532%G3361><s%> regarded <S%G1788><s%> man <S%G444><s%> :

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a widow <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , saying <S%G3004><s%> , Avenge <S%G1556><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> of <S%G575><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> a while <S%G5550><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G5023%G3326><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> , Though <S%G1499><s%> I fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> , nor <S%G2532%G3756><s%> regard <S%G1788><s%> man <S%G444><s%> ;

Yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> troubleth <S%G3930%G2873><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> , I will avenge <S%G1556><s%> her <S%G846><s%> , lest <S%G3363><s%> by <S%G1519><s%> her continual <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> she weary <S%G5299><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the unjust <S%G93><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> shall <S%G1557><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> avenge <S%G4160%G1557><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%> , which <S%G3588><s%> cry <S%G994><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , though <S%G2532><s%> he bear long <S%G3114><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> ?

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he will <S%G4160><s%> avenge <S%G1557><s%> them <S%G846><s%> speedily <S%G5034%G1722><s%> . Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> when <S%G687><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> , shall he find <S%G2147><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> ?

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036%G2532>spake<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3982>trusted<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>were<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1848>despised<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%>:

Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> ; the one <S%G1520><s%> a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> a publican <S%G5057><s%> .

The Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> , God <S%G2316><s%> , I thank <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are , extortioners <S%G727><s%> , unjust <S%G94><s%> , adulterers <S%G3432><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> publican <S%G5057><s%> .
I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> in the week <S%G4521><s%> , I give tithes <S%G586><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I possess <S%G2932><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> the publican <S%G5057><s%> , standing <S%G2476><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%> , would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> so much as <S%G3761><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> smote <S%G5180><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%> , saying <S%G3004><s%> , God <S%G2316><s%> be merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%> .

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> , this man <S%G3778><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> the other <S%G1565><s%> : for <S%G3754><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that exalteth <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be abased <S%G5013><s%> ; and <S%G1161><s%> he that humbleth <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted <S%G5312><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1025>infants<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he would <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> little children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a little child <S%G3813><s%> shall <S%G1525><s%> in no wise <S%G3364><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein <S%G1519%G846><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> callest thou <S%G3004><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ? none <S%G3762><s%> is good <S%G18><s%> , save <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> , that is , God <S%G2316><s%> .

Thou knowest <S%G1492><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> , Do <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> , Do <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%> , Do <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%> , Do <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%> , Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3503>youth<s%> up.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Yet <S%G2089><s%> lackest <S%G3007><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> thing: sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> distribute <S%G1239><s%> unto the poor <S%G4434><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> , follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%>, he <S%G1096>was<s%> very <S%G4036>sorrowful<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> very <S%G4036>sorrowful<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> hardly <S%G1423><s%> shall they <S%G1525><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> riches <S%G5536><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> !

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a needle's <S%G4476><s%> eye <S%G5168><s%> , than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .
<S%G1161>And<s%> they that <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> can <S%G1410>be<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, The things which are impossible <S%G102><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> possible <S%G1415><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> .
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2400>Lo<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213%G3754><s%> , There is <S%G2076><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> hath left <S%G863><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> , for <S%G1752><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> ,

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G618><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> receive <S%G618><s%> manifold more <S%G4179><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> present time <S%G2540><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> .

¶ <S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> unto him the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> , we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that are written <S%G1125><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> concerning the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be accomplished <S%G5055><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall be mocked <S%G1702><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> spitefully entreated <S%G5195><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> spitted on <S%G1716><s%> :

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall scourge <S%G3146><s%> him , and put <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G615><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G4920>understood<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G5130>things<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846%G2532>them<s%>, <S%G3756>neither<s%> knew <S%G1097>they<s%> the things which were <S%G3004>spoken<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho<s%>, a <S%G5100>certain<s%> blind <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the way <S%G3598>side<s%> <S%G4319>begging<s%>:
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> pass <S%G1279>by<s%>, he <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G1498>meant<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> passeth <S%G3928>by<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G994>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they which went <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should hold his <S%G4623>peace<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> so <S%G4183>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%>, Thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%>, and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>near<s%>, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> that I shall do <S%G4160><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> ? <S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may receive my <S%G308>sight<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Receive thy sight <S%G308><s%> : thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> hath saved <S%G4982><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> he received his <S%G308>sight<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G136>praise<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>.
